alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 9:01PM CDT until May 22 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR HASKELL...JONES...NORTHWESTERN SHACKELFORD...NORTHEASTERN FISHER AND SOUTHWESTERN THROCKMORTON COUNTIES... At 901 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stamford, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Paint Creek around 910 PM CDT. Stamford, Avoca and Lake Stamford Marina around 915 PM CDT. Lueders around 925 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Hitson, Tuxedo, Jud, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
